DOC.brief_summary: This study prospective randomize clinical trial compare efficacy urinary recombinant hCG oocyte quality ovulation induction woman undergo IVF/ICSI .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Efficacy Urinary Recombinant Human Chorionic Gonadotropin ( hCG ) Oocyte Maturity
DOC.detailed_description: The study population comprise infertile patient age 20-37 year underwent in-vitro fertilization royan institute , Tehran Iran . In study patient treat long stimulation protocol GnRH-analogue ( Buserelin subcutaneous , 0.5cc daily ) give pre-treatment recombinant FSH ( rFSH ) administration start pituitary desensitization confirm . From 7th day stimulation group , daily monitoring follicle size ultrasound perform dose rFSH adjust accord response patient . When least two follicle > 18 mm diameter see , ovulation trigger hCG patient allocate three different study group per follow : 1 . Group A consist 60 woman receive recombinant hCG ( 250 µg Ovitrelle ) 2 . Group B consist 60 woman receive recombinant hCG ( 500 µg Ovitrelle ) 3 . Group C consist 60 patient receive 10,000 IU urinary hCG Oocyte retrieval perform 34-36 hour hCG administration oocyte assess nuclear maturity . Embryos transfer 2-3 day thereafter . Data collection perform use questionnaire fill per available record laboratory result . Data analysis do descriptive perceptive statistical method use SPSS software version 16 window .
DOC.criteria: Indication IVF/ICSI Long Protocol ovarian stimulation Age 2037 Body mass index ( BMI ) ≤ 30 kg/m2 Regular menstrual cycle 2535 day Tubal male factor Existence ovary normal uterine cavity Basal FSH≥10 Physical health Poly Cystic Ovarian Syndrome patient Contraindications gonadotropins administration Poor response ovulation induction recent cycle
